 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָהַל‎</span>] **verb Pi\`el** ==lead, guide to a watering-place or station, and cause to rest there; bring to a station or place of rest; lead, guide; refresh== (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> watering-place, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> take a first drink; likewise ([[BDB#Dozy|Dozy]]) <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> station, stage of the road; perhaps also Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***Nâlu***</u></abbr>, ***lie down*** [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 438</sup>; [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HA 5f.; Prol. 17 ff.</sup> tries to explain all the passages from this Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***nâlu;***</u></abbr> against him see [[BDB#Prä|Prä]]<sup>LOPh i. 195</sup> [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Acad., April 12,1884</sup> [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>ZKF i. 357 f.</sup> [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xi. 1886, 728</sup>; ***two*** √ √ proposed by RDWilson<sup>Presb. Rev. (N.Y.), April, 1885</sup> (careful article), compare T. [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Psalm 23:2. critical note</sup>.); — 

**Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֵהַלָתָּ‎</span> [[Exod.15.13|Exod 15:13]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְנַהֵל‎</span> [[Isa.40.11|Isa 40:11]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְנַהֲלֵנִי‎</span> [[Ps.23.2|Ps 23:2]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְנַהְלֵם‎</span> [[Isa.49.10|Isa 49:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְנַהֲלֵם‎</span> [[Gen.47.17|Gen 47:17]]; [[2Chr.32.22|2Chr 32:22]] 2 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּנַהֲלֵנִי‎</span> [[Ps.31.4|Ps 31:4]] 3 masculine plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְנַהֲלוּם‎</span> [[2Chr.28.15|2Chr 28:15]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְנַהֵל‎</span> [[Isa.51.18|Isa 51:18]] — 

**1.** ***lead to watering-place (or station), and cause to rest there***, subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> as shepherd, [[Isa.49.10|Isa 49:10]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span> location; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נהג‎</span>), [[Ps.23.2|Ps 23:2]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span> location; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִרְבִּיץ‎</span>), [[Isa.40.11|Isa 40:11]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רעה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִבֵּץ‎</span>). 

**2.** ***lead*** or ***bring to a station, a goal***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject [[Exod.15.13|Exod 15:13]] (song; no object expressed, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֿ‎</span> location; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נחה‎</span>); human subject [[2Chr.28.15|2Chr 28:15]] ***and they conducted*** all the feeble of them ***by means of*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>) ***asses*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵבִיא‎</span>). 

**3.** ***lead, guide:*** figurative, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵין מְנַהֵל לָהּ‎</span> [[Isa.51.18|Isa 51:18]] ***there is no one to be a guide for her***, i.e. for Jerusalem, drunk with cup of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s fury (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַחֲזִיק בְּיָדָהּ‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject [[Ps.31.4|Ps 31:4]] ***lead me*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּנְחֵנִי‎</span>). 4. ***give rest to*** (?) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִסָּבִיב‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְנ‎</span> [[2Chr.32.22|2Chr 32:22]] ***and he gave them rest on every hand***, compare [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] (= <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּנִח לָהֶם מִסּ‎</span>  +, probably so read here, see [[BDB#Be|Be]] [[BDB#DHM|DHM]] [[BDB#Öt|Öttli]]). 

**5.** ***refresh*** with food, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְנ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּלֶּחֶם‎</span> [[Gen.47.17|Gen 47:17]] ([[BDB#J|J]]).

**Hithpa\`el** ***Imperfect*** probably ***journey by stations, stages***, only 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתְנַהֲלָה‎</span> [[Gen.33.14|Gen 33:14]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), ***I will proceed, journey on, by stages*** (i.e. deliberately with family and cattle). 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַהֲלָל‎</span> see II.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַהֲלֹל‎</span>. below
